Considering the request from the employees and as well as per the approval of the Management on the eve of Maha Shivaratri the office will remain closed on 7th March,2016 .Hope you all enjoy this auspicious day which is believed to be the day of convergence of divine powers of Lord Shiva and Goddess Shakti.

Swash launched a brand promotional campaign starting from 28th December 2014 to offer its bucket of services like 360 degree Business and Technology Consulting, Cloud Solutions, On-demand Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Enterprise Mobility Services, Big-data Analytics, etc. Swash received a massive response from all over nation including Bengaluru, Hyderabad, Kolkata, Mumbai, Pune, Delhi NCR, and Bhubaneswar. This ad was featured in Times Of India on 28-Dec-14 on Page No. 03.

KENESS is a complete package to take care of Employee Management using various functions including recruitment, training, work assignment, evaluation, performance appraisal, rewards, etc. Recruitment Management allows HR managers to automate Job Requisition, Recruitment Project Creation, Registration of Applicants, Receiving Applications, Arranging Interviews and Hiring with NO or lesser paperwork.

Attendance and Leave management is one of the basic functions in KENESS which not only helps HR Managers to track the employees but with the help of Calendar Management they use many more functions for keeping track of salary slips, holidays, etc.The Payroll Management automates payroll and salary processing with all the supporting functionalities.
